text.div:
Id: DT.IMMZ.D2.DT.HPV.Singledose
Url: Decision Table Determine required vaccinations
Version: 0.2.0
Title: Decision Table Determine required vaccinations
Status: draft
Date: 2025-07-17 20:56:25+0000
Publisher: WHO
Description:

Determine required vaccinations
Knowledge Capability: computable
Related Artifacts:

References

  • WHO recommendations for routine immunization – summary tables (March 2023) (1)
Libraries:
DTs.HPV
Actions:
Client is not due for HPV vaccination: Client is not due for HPV vaccination "Immunization recommendation status" = "Not due" As an off-label option, a single-dose schedule can be used in girls and boys aged 9–20 years.
Then: Definition: Decision Table Output Client is not due for HPV vaccination
Dynamic Values:
status: (draft)
intent: (proposal)
Health worker guidance: Communicate guidance to the health worker
Then: Definition: http://smart.who.int/base/ActivityDefinition/SGDecisionTableGuidance
Dynamic Values:
status: (active)
payload.contentString: (Should not vaccinate client with first HPV dose as client's age is less than 9 years. Check for any vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the next dose.)
category.coding: (Code { system: 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/communication-category', code: 'alert' })
priority: (Code { system: 'http://hl7.org/fhir/request-priority', code: 'routine' })
Client is due for HPV vaccination: Client is due for HPV vaccination "Immunization recommendation status" = "Due"
Then: Definition: Decision Table Output Client is due for HPV vaccination
Dynamic Values:
status: (draft)
intent: (proposal)
Health worker guidance: Communicate guidance to the health worker
Then: Definition: http://smart.who.int/base/ActivityDefinition/SGDecisionTableGuidance
Dynamic Values:
status: (active)
payload.contentString: (Should vaccinate client with first HPV dose as no HPV doses were administered and client is within appropriate age range. Check for contraindications.)
category.coding: (Code { system: 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/communication-category', code: 'alert' })
priority: (Code { system: 'http://hl7.org/fhir/request-priority', code: 'routine' })
Clinical judgement is required. Create a clinical note.: Clinical judgement is required. Create a clinical note. "Immunization recommendation status" = "Further evaluation needed"
Then: Definition: Decision Table Output Clinical judgement is required. Create a clinical note.
Dynamic Values:
status: (draft)
intent: (proposal)
Health worker guidance: Communicate guidance to the health worker
Then: Definition: http://smart.who.int/base/ActivityDefinition/SGDecisionTableGuidance
Dynamic Values:
status: (active)
payload.contentString: (Member States should update this action according to the national immunization programme.)
category.coding: (Code { system: 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/communication-category', code: 'alert' })
priority: (Code { system: 'http://hl7.org/fhir/request-priority', code: 'routine' })
Client is not due for HPV vaccination: Client is not due for HPV vaccination "Immunization recommendation status" = "Not due" Individuals known to be immunocompromised or infected with HIV (regardless of age or antiretroviral therapy status) should receive at least two HPV vaccine doses (minimum 6 months interval) and, where possible, three doses.
Then: Definition: Decision Table Output Client is not due for HPV vaccination
Dynamic Values:
status: (draft)
intent: (proposal)
Health worker guidance: Communicate guidance to the health worker
Then: Definition: http://smart.who.int/base/ActivityDefinition/SGDecisionTableGuidance
Dynamic Values:
status: (active)
payload.contentString: (Should not vaccinate client with second HPV dose as the latest HPV dose was administered less than 6 months ago. Check for any vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the next dose.)
category.coding: (Code { system: 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/communication-category', code: 'alert' })
priority: (Code { system: 'http://hl7.org/fhir/request-priority', code: 'routine' })
Client is due for HPV vaccination: Client is due for HPV vaccination "Immunization recommendation status" = "Due"
Then: Definition: Decision Table Output Client is due for HPV vaccination
Dynamic Values:
status: (draft)
intent: (proposal)
Health worker guidance: Communicate guidance to the health worker
Then: Definition: http://smart.who.int/base/ActivityDefinition/SGDecisionTableGuidance
Dynamic Values:
status: (active)
payload.contentString: (Should vaccinate client with second HPV dose as client is HIV positive and the latest HPV dose was administered more than 6 months ago. Check for contraindications)
category.coding: (Code { system: 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/communication-category', code: 'alert' })
priority: (Code { system: 'http://hl7.org/fhir/request-priority', code: 'routine' })
Client is not due for HPV vaccination: Client is not due for HPV vaccination "Immunization recommendation status" = "Not due"
Then: Definition: Decision Table Output Client is not due for HPV vaccination
Dynamic Values:
status: (draft)
intent: (proposal)

Then: Definition: http://smart.who.int/base/ActivityDefinition/SGDecisionTableGuidance
Dynamic Values:

payload.contentString: (Should not vaccinate client with second HPV dose as the latest HPV dose was administered less than 6 months ago. Check for any vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the next dose.)
category.coding: (Code { system: 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/communication-category', code: 'alert' })
priority: (Code { system: 'http://hl7.org/fhir/request-priority', code: 'routine' })
Client is due for HPV vaccination: Client is due for HPV vaccination "Immunization recommendation status" = "Due"
Then: Definition: Decision Table Output Client is due for HPV vaccination
Dynamic Values:

intent: (proposal)

Then: Definition: http://smart.who.int/base/ActivityDefinition/SGDecisionTableGuidance
Dynamic Values:
status: (active)
payload.contentString: (Should vaccinate client with second HPV dose as client is immunocompromised and the latest HPV dose was administered more than 6 months ago. Check for contraindications)
category.coding: (Code { system: 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/communication-category', code: 'alert' })
priority: (Code { system: 'http://hl7.org/fhir/request-priority', code: 'routine' })
HPV immunization schedule is complete: HPV immunization schedule is complete "Immunization recommendation status" = "Complete" –
Then: Definition: Decision Table Output HPV immunization schedule is complete
Dynamic Values:
status: (draft)
intent: (proposal)
Health worker guidance: Communicate guidance to the health worker
Then: Definition: http://smart.who.int/base/ActivityDefinition/SGDecisionTableGuidance
Dynamic Values:
status: (active)
payload.contentString: (HPV immunization schedule is complete. One HPV primary series dose was administered. Check for any other vaccines due.)
category.coding: (Code { system: 'http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/communication-category', code: 'alert' })
priority: (Code { system: 'http://hl7.org/fhir/request-priority', code: 'routine' })

relatedArtifact.citation: WHO recommendations for routine immunization – summary tables (March 2023) (1)

action.title: Client is not due for HPV vaccination
action.description:
Client is not due for HPV vaccination
"Immunization recommendation status" = "Not due"

As an off-label option, a single-dose schedule can be used in girls and boys aged 9–20 years.

action.title: Health worker guidance
action.description: Communicate guidance to the health worker

expression.expression:
Should not vaccinate client with first HPV dose as client's age is less than 9 years. 
Check for any vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the next dose.

action.title: Client is due for HPV vaccination
action.description:
Client is due for HPV vaccination
"Immunization recommendation status" = "Due"

action.title: Health worker guidance
action.description: Communicate guidance to the health worker

expression.expression:
Should vaccinate client with first HPV dose as no HPV doses were administered and client is within appropriate age range. 
Check for contraindications.

action.title: Clinical judgement is required. Create a clinical note.
action.description:
Clinical judgement is required. Create a clinical note.
"Immunization recommendation status" = "Further evaluation needed"

action.title: Health worker guidance
action.description: Communicate guidance to the health worker

expression.expression: Member States should update this action according to the national immunization programme.

action.title: Client is not due for HPV vaccination
action.description:
Client is not due for HPV vaccination
"Immunization recommendation status" = "Not due"

Individuals known to be immunocompromised or infected with HIV (regardless of age or antiretroviral therapy status) should receive at least two HPV vaccine doses (minimum 6 months interval) and, where possible, three doses.

action.title: Health worker guidance
action.description: Communicate guidance to the health worker

expression.expression:
Should not vaccinate client with second HPV dose as the latest HPV dose was administered less than 6 months ago. 
Check for any vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the next dose.

action.description:
Client is due for HPV vaccination
"Immunization recommendation status" = "Due"

action.title: Health worker guidance
action.description: Communicate guidance to the health worker

expression.expression:
Should vaccinate client with second HPV dose as client is HIV positive and the latest HPV dose was administered more than 6 months ago. 
Check for contraindications

Individuals known to be immunocompromised or infected with HIV (regardless of age or antiretroviral therapy status) should receive at least two HPV vaccine doses (minimum 6 months interval) and, where possible, three doses.
